description: This header defines internal API functions for managing a string array object, including functions for getting size, setting size, removing all elements, accessing and modifying elements, inserting, removing, adding, enlarging storage, and finding elements.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayGetSize
methods.description: Returns the size of the string array object.

methods.name: AnscStringArraySetSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the string array, with an option to specify growth factor.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayRemoveAll
methods.description: Removes all elements from the string array.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayGetAt
methods.description: Retrieves the element data at the specified index.

methods.name: AnscStringArraySetAt
methods.description: Sets the element data at the specified index.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayInsertAt
methods.description: Inserts data at the specified index, with count indicating how many elements to insert.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayRemoveAt
methods.description: Removes a specified number of elements starting from the given index.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayAdd
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the array, returning its index.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayEnlargeStorage
methods.description: Enlarges the storage capacity of the string array to a new size.

methods.name: AnscStringArrayFind
methods.description: Finds the index of the specified data in the array, returns -1 if not found.
